name: NEKOPALIVE
description: The catgirls of La Soleil takes to the stage and steps into the spotlight with their very own live concert. Dancing, singing, MIX'ing and purring, this is the NEKOPARA event that comes right home to you, and you got the best seat in the house!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 64bit only Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Additional Notes: Oculus Rift and HTC Vive Compatible

reviews.review_text: For those of you craving those virtual catgirls but dont have the money for a vive or rift. 1. Buy google cardboard headset 2. I̶n̶s̶t̶a̶l̶l̶ BUY riftcat (14.99 USD)  3. enable usb tethering on your phone 4. use riftcat to play steamvr games 5. start nekopalive 6. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
What a wonderful time to be alive.
This game is the only reason why im going to get VR
Bought a vr headset to experience the rich plot in this game.
Well, I wouldn't say no to free porn.

Well, it's free and I think it demonstrates what the future of live entertainment could be. I would rather go to a VR concert than suffer the indignity of standing in long lines, pay for expensive tickets, have a lousy view, be constrained to what I eat and drink, etc, etc, etc.
Don't have a VR headset? Google Cardboard + Android Phone + Riftcat = winning.  Now I can finally be in the same room as Coconut!
I write this review in the street.  10/10 will forget to lock their room
Better than Killing Floor Incursion
This game is about cat girls in 3D.  10/10 would play again.

This game is a zombie survival game. Even better than L4d2. It is extremely emersive, and with the vr, it feels like you are right there in the action. Id recomend this game to anyone who enjoys zombie games or fps games.
Good VR Game which contains Coconut my favourite ^^  I Totaly Recomend this game with my 10+ Hours!

Adorable little manga idol show, I really enjoyed it, the few issues I have are a little flickering of the scene and the menu to launch the songs was on the monitor not the HMD, aside from that for a free demo I totally recommend it to manga/jpop fans!

Really? 94% positive for this???   There is no game. Just two girls dancing.  Go to youtube and search for 'Babymetal'.  Or.  Go to any porn site that has anime. Way better than this 'game'. It has 3 buttons.  I can't read anything but 3 buttons are lit up. 2 will make the girls dance.   1 button will try to get you to let them take over your twitter account and post for you!??

No matter how much you love catgirls and J-pop, it's impossible to enjoy this low res experience. Seriously, if you've got your VR headset on, be prepared for '240p Simulator VR'.  It's not obvious from the Kanji in the menu, but you can use the number keys to change camera angles, complete with a ridiculously long paw-wipe that almost convinced me to give this experience a thumbs-up. If you are a pedo, you'll probably want to stick to angle 2, while if you like large breasts you're better off with 3. The other angles put you so far away from the stage (we're talking entire yards) that all you'll see is an indistict blur, as if you were watching VHS anime bootlegs play on your neighbor's 20 inch CRT television through the window.  You have to physically bend over and get near to the floor in order to look up the girls' skirts, which is  demeaning . Also, none of the camera angles gets you close enough to even pretend like you could grope the performers - unless your playspace is an entire living room, the stage is probably going to be past the wall. Lastly, the large-breasted performer clearly has bad implants, as her rock-solid bosom never jiggles nor sways.  The performers are strictly amateur; while their dance is well synchronized, the choreography is pedestrian and repetitive. You probably already know whether you like the music, to which I am personally indifferent.  If you were hoping to molest some hi-res catgirls up close, this is almost nothing you want. Lastly, 66% of the catgirls in the title image aren't actually in NekoPALIVE, so if you're digging girls 1, 3,4, or 6, you'd best look elsewhere.
